home.title: Grand Austria Hotel Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Grand Austria Hotel solo against Leopold and Elisabeth.
home.play2: This application implements the official solo mode of Grand Austria Hotel: Let's Waltz. It replaces the solo card deck. You can play with the base game, or with the modules from the Let's Waltz expansion.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
